title: Right to Education Act (RTE), 2009
description: Ensures free and compulsory education for children aged 6-14 under Article 21A of the Indian Constitution.

title: University Grants Commission (UGC) Regulations, 1956
description: Regulates higher education standards, including student rights, degree recognition, and institutional policies.

title: National Education Policy (NEP) 2020
description: Aims to reform education with focus on student assessment, vocational training, and equitable access.

title: UGC Regulations on Curbing the Menace of Ragging, 2009
description: Prohibits ragging in educational institutions with penalties like suspension or imprisonment.

title: Consumer Protection Act, 2019 (Education Services)
description: Protects students from unfair fee practices or misleading promises by educational institutions.

title: Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015
description: Provides protection and rehabilitation for students under 18 facing legal or social issues.
